name: arif
about:
Hi, I'm Arif, and was born in Indonesia. I'm always curious, especially about technology. I will learn every details of things that interest me, until one day, coding became my hobby, yes I really love Coding üë®üèº‚Äçüíª

I always keep update about technology, and sometimes when new technology came out, I implement that into my work, yes I love bleeding edge technology ü§ñ

Technology was become part of my life. With passionate, creative, enthuastic and always try to learn, i like create products really quallify and unique

portfolios.name: cokro pondasi
portfolios.content: Cokro Pondasi is a bore pile contractor company, located in Tangerang Selatan, Indonesia. Currently PT. Cokro Pondasi serve various foundation work with bore pile system for office project, hotel, shop, housing, shopping centers, and so forth throughout Indonesia.

portfolios.name: ydigital asia
portfolios.content: Ydigital Asia is a digital marketing agency in Jakarta who helps transform brand from thinking digital to being digital. All in the name of driving business performance. they have some services like Strategy & Consulting, Technology & Operations, and Marketing & Sales.

portfolios.name: ActionCOACH South Jakarta
portfolios.content: ActionCOACH is a business coach located at South Jakarta, Indonesia. They will be an objective personal business mentor and also helps their clients to be more efficient, gives small pointers based on years of experience and support in developing long-term plans in order to get more profit for business.

skills.content: ReactJS - Simply because I love Single Page Application, also I do mobile application using React Native
JavaScript - With JavaScript I can create almost everything, desktop app, mobile app
NodeJS - I learn it simply because it's JavaScript running on server
Docker - Made my shipping time to production faster
Wordpress - I dont't write PHP code, but I write themes
MongoDB - When talk about NoSQL, I choose MongoDB

testimonials.content: I am satisfied with the website I requested. The results so smooth. Highly recommended for everyone who wants to create own website
